post.body: I think you just gave @WOnet an aneurysm with that pic
:-P Notice that I let them play now. FYI Raving Rabbids is not as fun by yourself...
are you sure about that?
sounds like fun! Hoping to take the kids up to the snow during the break. They have never been!
morning. the kids have decided that it is the perfect time to try out their skateboards. come home soon and bring hot beverage?
Thanks so much for the posters for the kids! Sorry I missed you...But will be there for the Tweet-up Game!
2day seems 2 be a cleaning day. BOTH kids cleaned rooms. probly helped that they were bribed w/ DS games. best buy had them buy 1 get 1 free
ok time to go get coffee. And feeder fish.
Another round of Rayman 3 on the Wii. @WOnet is slightly distracted tonight as he searches for Podcast music
At Barnes and Noble. I need coffee since I am stuck supervising in the kids section
I must admit the crayola glo pad is pretty cool...
Two can play that game @WOnet http://snipurl.com/957ac
Hooray for naps! Boo headaches and stuffy noses:-(
Kids have given up on skateboarding for the moment. Now it's lunch and a little Harry Potter. wii still isn't working :-(
going to kill kidlets. Wii is having issues so they are throwing attitude around. Not a good thing to do before mom has had coffee
well the 'rents are on the way home. Now its time to tackle the post-holiday house.
Well the kiddos got bored with Sorry. Since it doesn't beep etc like their ds. Guess that means it time to clean up http://snipurl.com/94blp
I am getting my butt beat at Connect Four, this is sad! Maybe I will do better at Sorry!
I cooked enough for a small army. Can you say Left overs? http://snipurl.com/948b5
giggling to step dad complain about the fact that the Spurs called a time out and moved the ball down court. He thinks its stupid
